# Badminton Scheduler - Complete Full-Stack TypeScript App

This repository contains a production-ready badminton match scheduler with:

- ✅ Backend API (Node + Express + TypeScript)
- ✅ Frontend UI (React + TypeScript + Vite)
- ✅ Smart scheduling algorithm with DSA optimization
- ✅ Comprehensive test suite
- ✅ JSON persistence
- ✅ Round completion tracking

See [README.md](./README.md) for complete documentation.

## Quick Start

**Backend:**

```bash
cd backend && npm install && npm run start
```

**Frontend:**

```bash
cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
```

**Tests:**

```bash
cd backend && npm run test
```

Visit `http://localhost:5173` to use the app!
